description:
As a student he received a love confession from http://anidb.net/ch52353 [Inamura Ikuyo]. But, rejected her due to family circumstances. He gave her half of a pendant to remember him by.
He later became http://anidb.net/ch52352 [Nijigahara Makoto]`s father, and gave him the other half of the pendant.
name: Nijigahara Makoto no Papa
